name: Operation Zeta
description:
Operation Zeta is a space rougelike. The great battle codenamed 'Operation Zeta' has been lost. Your ship is in shambles and you have to act quickly to collect all of the parts and repair your ship before the warzone is completely destroyed by the enemies death laser. Play and unlock different ships across different races each with their own unique set of skills and challenges. As well unlock new abilities and upgrades with credits you earn during each run. Made in our custom game engine built from the ground up!



Explore a randomly generated space system to find the parts to your broken ship.



Help out or fight the bizzare and exotic natives to recover the parts of your crashed warship.



Collect rewards to unlock new ships and races from monkeys with space helmets to space slugs to play in future playthroughs!
